text: No kugira ngo musabe imbabazi Nyagasani wanyu ndetse munamwicuzeho, bityo azabahe ibyishimo bihebuje kugeza igihe cyagenwe (cyo gupfa), anahe buri wese wakoze neza ibihembo bye. Ariko nimwigomeka (mukirengagiza ibyo mbahamagarira), mu by’ukuri njye ndatinya ko mwazahura n’ibihano byo ku munsi ukomeye
